item.description:
Here's something different - and VERY delicious too. I tested this place for you tonight (sheesh, the things I do for you guys) It was great! Good atmosphere, good food, good music and the prices are very reasonable. Most entrees are priced between 15 - 18 dollars. Though less will get you very ample appetizer plates. There is a pay parking lot directly next door. I have reserved 16 spots all together and four of them are in a cozy little veiled cushioned seating area for the younger members of our group. If you like to be adventurous without getting too exotic, I think you will enjoy this. Here is a link :http://www.istanbulca... . As usual, call me if there are questions, complaints (nah not really) or you need directions. This is a fairly small place and I must let them know a final headcount 48 hours in advance, so if you say you are coming - please come. See you guys there. Here's my phone number:

802
233
9060

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Istanbul Cafe - after a week of workish, join us for Turkish.
